subject: Re: I'm looking for a little info or direction...
msgSnippet: Zen Buddhism was the sect preferred by most samurai. The majority would have also practiced both Shinto and Buddhism. The two religions complement each other

Zen Buddhism was the sect preferred by most samurai. The majority would 
have also practiced both Shinto and Buddhism. The two religions 
complement each other well.
